name: Universe of Shapes
description:
A game made in 72-hours Shape game jam 

Its game about "exploring" rails and killing enemies and lighting up the lamps while 

listening to sound effects.

Unfortunately you can die in this game, its very hard to do it but I warn you not to go in to all of enemies at once :) 

Controlls:

-Mouse to aim

-Mouse1 to shoot

-Mouse2 to dash(you are immune to bullets while dashing)

-Space to change direction
